gratitude.verse: Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, and into his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, and bless his name.
gratitude.prayer: Father, I enter Your presence with a heart full of thanksgiving. Open the gates of glory for me today.

gratitude.verse: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.
gratitude.prayer: Lord, teach me to give thanks in ALL circumstances.

warfare.verse: (For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal, but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds;)
warfare.prayer: Mighty God, I take up spiritual weapons today.
